text: @SenSchumer Hey you embarrassing assclown when did you become a doctor??? Why would anyone want to believe and lying piece of garbage like you when doctors are saying the drug works. You’re an embarrassment and a disgrace. retire already. 35 years in Congress nothing https://t.co/P5Ob351CEQ
